definition: A brief account of a person's education, qualifications, and previous occupations, typically sent with a job application.
example: Please attach your curriculum vitae to the application.
example_translation: Proszę załączyć swój życiorys do aplikacji.

definition: An occupation undertaken for a significant period of a person's life and with opportunities for progress.
example: She plans to pursue a career in law.
example_translation: Planuje rozwijać karierę w dziedzinie prawa.

definition: Goals or aims that someone is trying to achieve.
example: The objectives of the project are clear.
example_translation: Cele projektu są jasne.

definition: Information required to communicate with someone, such as address, phone number, and email.
example: Please provide your contact details.
example_translation: Proszę podać swoje dane kontaktowe.

definition: A desired position or achievement that one aims for in their professional life.
example: My career goal is to become a manager.
example_translation: Moim celem kariery jest zostanie menedżerem.

definition: To list or highlight abilities and proficiencies one possesses.
example: In your CV, mention skills relevant to the job.
example_translation: W swoim CV wymień umiejętności istotne dla tej pracy.

definition: To incorporate or add details of one's educational and professional credentials.
example: Make sure to include qualifications in your resume.
example_translation: Upewnij się, że w swoim CV uwzględniłeś kwalifikacje.

definition: Practical contact with and observation of facts or events.
example: He has five years of experience in marketing.
example_translation: Ma pięcioletnie doświadczenie w marketingu.

definition: Things done successfully, typically by effort, courage, or skill.
example: Her achievements in the field are impressive.
example_translation: Jej osiągnięcia w tej dziedzinie są imponujące.

definition: Hobbies or activities that are pertinent to the job or field.
example: List any relevant interests on your resume.
example_translation: Wymień istotne zainteresowania w swoim CV.

definition: Important words or phrases related to a particular subject or job.
example: Use appropriate keywords to enhance your resume.
example_translation: Użyj odpowiednich słów kluczowych, aby wzmocnić swoje CV.

definition: Selected or chosen by someone.
example: The candidates were picked out by the hiring manager.
example_translation: Kandydaci zostali wybrani przez kierownika ds. rekrutacji.

definition: Statements that represent something as better or worse than it really is.
example: Avoid exaggerations in your resume.
example_translation: Unikaj przesady w swoim CV.

definition: Giving a lot of information clearly and in a few words.
example: A resume should be clear and concise.
example_translation: CV powinno być jasne i zwięzłe.

definition: The way in which text or pictures are set out on a page.
example: The layout of your resume is important.
example_translation: Układ twojego CV jest ważny.

definition: Interesting and exciting.
example: He found the new project stimulating.
example_translation: Nowy projekt okazał się dla niego stymulujący.

translation: ugruntowany/taki, który istnieje od jakiegoś czasu
definition: One that has existed for some time.
example: They have an established reputation in the industry.
example_translation: Mają ugruntowaną reputację w branży.

definition: Producing new ideas.
example: Creativity is essential for this role.
example_translation: Kreatywność jest niezbędna w tej roli.

definition: Ability to manage people and lead them in new directions.
example: He demonstrated strong leadership skills.
example_translation: Wykazał się silnymi zdolnościami przywódczymi.

definition: The process of maintaining or preserving something.
example: Regular maintenance is required.
example_translation: Wymagana jest regularna obsługa techniczna.

definition: Able to speak two languages.
example: She is bilingual in English and Spanish.
example_translation: Ona jest dwujęzyczna - mówi po angielsku i hiszpańsku.

definition: Working independently, not as a company employee.
example: He works as a freelance graphic designer.
example_translation: Pracuje jako niezależny grafik.

definition: Giving (something, especially money) in order to help achieve or provide something.
example: She is contributing to the team's success.
example_translation: Ona przyczynia się do sukcesu zespołu.

definition: To supply or make available.
example: All necessary materials will be provided.
example_translation: Wszystkie niezbędne materiały będą dostarczone.

definition: A letter sent with, and explaining the contents of, another document or a parcel of goods.
example: Please include a cover letter with your application.
example_translation: Proszę załączyć list motywacyjny do swojej aplikacji.

definition: A file sent with an email message.
example: I have included my resume as an attachment.
example_translation: Załączyłem swoje CV jako załącznik.

definition: An email that accompanies another document to explain its content or context.
example: Send your resume and a cover email.
example_translation: Wyślij swoje CV i email motywacyjny.

definition: A job or role within a company.
example: She applied for a managerial position.
example_translation: Aplikowała na stanowisko menedżerskie.

definition: A phrase used to introduce the subject of the letter or email.
example: I am writing with reference to your job advertisement.
example_translation: Piszę z referencjami do waszego ogłoszenia o pracę.

definition: A phrase used to point out something in the attached documents or previous communications.
example: As you will see in my resume, I have extensive experience.
example_translation: Jak widać w moim CV, mam duże doświadczenie.

definition: A resume that is included with a letter or email.
example: Please find my attached CV for your consideration.
example_translation: W załączeniu przesyłam swoje CV do rozważenia.

definition: A summary of one's professional and educational history.
example: My background includes five years in marketing.
example_translation: Moje doświadczenie obejmuje pięć lat w marketingu.

definition: At a recent time; not long ago.
example: I recently graduated from university.
example_translation: Ostatnio ukończyłem studia.

word: I would now like to relocate
definition: A phrase indicating a desire to move to a different location for work.
example: I would now like to relocate to New York.
example_translation: Chciałbym się teraz przenieść do Nowego Jorku.

definition: A phrase indicating when one is ready to start a job or attend an interview.
example: I am available for an interview at your earliest convenience.
example_translation: Jestem dostępny na rozmowę kwalifikacyjną w dogodnym dla Państwa terminie.

word: I look forward to hearing from you
definition: A polite phrase indicating that one is anticipating a response.
example: I look forward to hearing from you soon.
example_translation: Czekam na wiadomość od Ciebie wkrótce.

definition: A formal sign-off used at the end of a letter.
example: Yours sincerely, John Doe
example_translation: Z poważaniem, John Doe

definition: Using few words; not including extra or unnecessary information.
example: Please write concisely.
example_translation: Proszę pisać zwięźle.

definition: A number of different people applying for a job.
example: The job attracted various candidates.
example_translation: Praca przyciągnęła różnych kandydatów.

definition: Undoubtedly; definitely; with certainty.
example: I will certainly attend the meeting.
example_translation: Z pewnością wezmę udział w spotkaniu.

definition: To leave school or an organization before completion.
example: He dropped out of college to start his own business.
example_translation: Odpadł z uczelni, aby założyć własny biznes.

definition: Chosen or selected from a group.
example: She was picked out for her excellent performance.
example_translation: Została wybrana za swoje doskonałe wyniki.
